rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with Brutalist features such as exposed concrete and geometric shapes.

rooms.description: Modern dining space integrated within the living room area to maximize openness.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with an open layout, incorporating natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Dual car garage accommodating two vehicles, designed with robust concrete structures.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a dedicated balcony designed in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2

rooms.name: Bedroom 3

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace designed for productivity, ensuring ample natural light and minimal distractions.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
